meanings.sent1: I poured a dib of milk into my coffee.

meanings.sent3: The chef added a dib of salt to the soup, making it perfect.
meanings.sent4: His kindness was just a dib in the vast sea of cruelty around him.
meanings.sent5: The tiny dib of courage she felt gave her the strength to speak up.
